title: 1(b) of Schedule 2 to the Finance Act 2018 (No. 30 of 2018) is deemed to have
heading: 2. The 22nd day of April 2021 is appointed as the day on which paragraph
text_raw:
2. The 22nd day of April 2021 is appointed as the day on which paragraph 
1(b) of Schedule 2 to the Finance Act 2018 (No. 30 of 2018) is deemed to have 
come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 July, 2021. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 23rd July, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [374] 3

title: 1(b) of Schedule 2 to the Finance Act 2018 (No. 30 of 2018) is deemed to have
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

This order appoints 22 April 2021 as the date of coming into effect of paragraph 
1(b) of Schedule 2 Finance Act 2018. 

Paragraph 1(b) of Schedule 2 amends section 790B Taxes Consolidation Act 
1997 to reflect the transposition of “Directive (EU) 2016/2341 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 14 December 2016 on the activities and 
supervision of institutions for occupational retirement provision (IORPs) 
(recast)” into Irish law on 22 April 2021 and the repeal of “Directive 2003/41/EC 
of the European Parliament and of the Council of 3 June 2003 on the activities 
and supervision of institutions for occupational retirement provision”. 

Section 790B is concerned with tax exemptions for IORPs, as defined in the 
2003 Directive, which are established under irrevocable trusts in the State and 
are authorised and approved by the competent authority in the State to accept 
contributions from undertakings located in other EU Member States. For the 
purposes of section 790B, “Directive” and “scheme” are defined in terms of the 
2003 Directive. 

This Order makes the necessary amendments to section 790B to reflect the 
transposition of the 2016 Directive and the repeal of the 2003 Directive. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [374]
